card.name: The Lux Foundation Library
card.text: Players have no maximum hand size. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. Whenever chaos ensues, put a shadow counter on target creature. (A creature with shadow can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

card.text: Menace Other enchantment creatures you control have menace. Whenever Anikthea enters the battlefield or attacks, exile up to one target non-Aura enchantment card from your graveyard. card.text: Domain — Tribal Flames deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

card.name: Vendilion Clique
card.text: Flash Flying When Vendilion Clique enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of their library, then draws a card.

card.name: Waterlogged Grove
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G} or {U}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Waterlogged Grove: Draw a card.

card.name: Wild Nacatl
card.text: Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Mountain. Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains.

card.name: Worn Powerstone
card.text: Worn Powerstone enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}{C}.
